name: cedo-google-auth
description: CEDO Google Auth - Full Stack Application

scripts.install: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && npm start" "cd backend && npm start"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.test: concurrently "cd frontend && npm test" "cd backend && npm test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run lint" "cd backend && npm run lint"
scripts.clean: cd frontend && npm run clean && cd ../backend && npm run clean
scripts.health: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run health" "cd backend && npm run health"
